posts.post_title: Raw C46 Tim Jordan for sale - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Afternoon Folks,

Just upgraded this card, so I have this guy to sell.  $SOLD delivered...

Please notice the paperloss on the front of the card, left side of Jordan's cheek/head.

Scans available...

Post here or email me at [url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url]

Richard.
